lore: The Skeleton Triggerman is the most swashbuckling of its kind. It likes to sneak into big cities, go into taverns of lesser repute and shoot up the place for fun. Thanks to its reckless behavior, the main weakness of its species was quickly discovered: the only way to defeat them for good is to damage their skulls. It also seems to like drinking whiskey, though it spills on the floor through the cavity of its throat.
menagerieDialog: I'm glad we stopped to rest. I need to clean my guns.
(Why does it always feel the need to point its gun toward your kneecaps? Doesn't it know proper gun etiquette?)
While your kingdom's knowledge of magic is admirable, its technology leaves much to be desired.
(It's spinning a gun around on its finger in an attempt to impress you.)
(It's shouting "YEE-HAW" while shooting its gun into the air. No worries, little Skeleton, we'll pay to repair the damage once you're finished.)
name: Skeleton Triggerman
